_sText:
Remake of another old maps I made years ago, kind of a combination of the ze_ocean_escape maps, hope you enjoy it.

***Version 2***

- Reworked Spawn, 
When round begins the Spawning room is locked for 60secs. One of the three routes will be randomly opened. Zombies should be set to spawn at or around the 30secs mark to give zombies around 20secs to infect any CTs before they are teleported to the route around 50secs mark. 
- (Middle) Ship Route's Fire room is now a Fire Pit room in which CTs must scale along the broken pipes
- (Right) Modern Route now has a 20secs Lift Cts must defend
- (Left) Old Route is darker and less lit
- Improved FPS
- Emergency Door removed
- Weapons tables moved infront of Submarine catwalk

***Version 3***

- Console commands and props added to better help direct players
- Spawn room size increased with 10 different hold areas as well as the initial hold time decreased to 45 seconds
- (Middle) Ship Route's Fire room pipes rearranged and pit block added for any zombies nocked down into
- Fixed minor bugs and errors

***Version 4***

- Added Music
- Added 3 Dummy ideas
- Added a few decals
- Added Zombie spawn command for 15 seconds
- Added lighting for overhead Submarine ladder and console
- 1/3 chance on which path is chosen
- Zombie delay on path choice 5~7 seconds
- OLD PATH darkened with a few props removed
- MODERN PATH tram messages fixed and 5 seconds add onto hold time and a few props removed
- Ladders remade
- Final section door blocks removed with a few light, all lights in section are now RED
